answers.answer: My Mom had to have a Cesarean Section with my brother due to gestational diabetes because he was measuring in at 9lbs when she was 6 months pregnant and by her 9th month he was born a week late and was 12lbs .
^ oh wow that's a huge baby lol I had gestational diabetes too and baby was born at 6lbs 10oz I got a c section bc when I got induce I wasn't dilating anymore and had high blood pressure
That is a huge baby. I've been told today that I'm being induced at 38 weeks,  unless my gestational diabetes gets worse and then or little man is delivered even earlier.

question: Just wondering how many of you lovely ladies ended up having a C Section due to Gestational Diabetes? For example your baby was measuring to big early on and got weren't allowed to go full term.
title: Who had a C Section due to Gestational Diabetes
